item.title: 简街与印度市场监管机构对簿公堂
item.description: 周二，上诉法院的一个三人法庭将开始审理 Jane Street Group LLC 与印度市场监管机构之间的案件，此案备受关注，对全球最大的股票衍生品市场产生了广泛影响。【原文：A three-member appeals court bench will begin hearings on Tuesday between Jane Street Group LLC and India’s market regulator, in a closely watched case with broad implications for the world’s biggest equity derivatives market.】

item.title: 经济担忧加剧，澳大利亚消费者信心指数下降
item.description: 澳大利亚消费者信心指数在 9 月份有所下降，原因是在高调裁员之际，家庭对经济和更广泛的劳动力市场前景感到担忧。【原文：Australia’s consumer confidence declined in September as households worried about prospects for the economy and the broader labor market at a time of high-profile job cuts.】

item.title: 美联储降息乐观情绪飙升，黄金逼近最新纪录
item.description: 黄金在周一创下的最新纪录附近持稳，对美联储今年降息潮的押注激增刺激了黄金的涨势。【原文：Gold held near its latest record reached on Monday, with its rally stoked by a surge in bets for a wave of Federal Reserve rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 微光说：中国推动绿色发展可能在 2030 年前减少全球化石燃料使用量
item.description: 清洁能源智囊团微光（Ember）周二在一份报告中说，由于中国迅速采用可再生能源并日益依赖电力，全球化石燃料的使用量可能会在大约五年后开始下降。【原文：The stage may be set for the world’s use of fossil fuels to begin dropping in about five years time, thanks to China’s rapid adoption of renewables and its increasing reliance on electricity, clean energy think tank Ember said in a report on Tuesday.】

item.title: 股票大涨，澳大利亚主权财富基金回报率达 12.2
item.description: 在股市和私人投资强劲的推动下，澳大利亚主权财富基金截至 6 月份的年度回报率达到 12.2%。【原文：Australia’s sovereign wealth fund posted a 12.2% return for the year through June, fueled by strong stock markets and private investments.】

item.title: 印度央行削减美债，在特朗普加征关税前就已买入黄金
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对印度征收惩罚性关税之前，印度央行就稳步减少了美国国债的购买量，并增加了黄金的购买量，因为印度正在从一度被视为避风港的资产中分散投资。【原文：India’s central bank steadily reduced its purchases of US Treasuries and increased gold buying even before President Donald Trump slapped the country with punishing tariffs, as the country diversifies away from what was once seen as a safe haven asset.】

item.title: 蚂蚁数字手臂将 80 亿美元能源资产纳入区块链
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，蚂蚁金服集团公司旗下的一个部门正在悄悄地将价值超过600亿元人民币（84亿美元）的能源基础设施和其他现实世界中的电力资产链接到其区块链上。【原文：A unit of Ant Group Co. is quietly making inroads to link over 60 billion yuan ($8.4 billion) worth of energy infrastructure and other real-world power assets to its blockchain, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构称人工智能聊天机器人对儿童构成 "明显威胁
item.description: 澳大利亚网络安全监管机构在推出新的服务管理规则时表示，由人工智能驱动的聊天机器人会鼓励自杀或进行露骨的性对话，对儿童构成 "明显而现实的危险"。【原文：Artificial intelligence-powered chatbots that encourage suicide or hold sexually explicit conversations pose a “clear and present danger” to children, Australia’s online safety regulator said, as it rolled out new rules governing the services.】

item.title: 沙特降价令需求前景成为焦点，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯下调大部分等级石油的定价后，投资者权衡了需求疲软的前景，石油价格趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied as investors weighed the prospect for softening demand after Saudi Arabia cut pricing for most of its grades.】

item.title: 杜邦债券持有人反对 54 亿美元债务交换计划
item.description: 杜邦公司（DuPont de Nemours Inc.）的一些债券持有人对该化工企业集团计划将多达 54 亿美元的票据换成更新的证券并取消一些与债务相关的投资者保护措施的做法表示反对。【原文：Some of DuPont de Nemours Inc.’s bondholders are pushing back on the chemical conglomerate’s plan to swap as much as $5.4 billion of its notes for newer securities and remove some investor protections tied to the debt.】

item.title: 日本首相候选人交易指南
item.description: 日本首相石破茂的下台计划让投资者争先恐后地评估其对日本股票、政府债券和货币的影响。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s plan to step down has investors scrambling to assess the implications for the nation’s stocks, government bonds and currency.】

item.title: 前应用程序员工称老板忽视网络安全漏洞
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc. 旗下 WhatsApp 的一名前员工周一提起联邦诉讼，称他多次向上司提出有关该消息应用的网络安全问题，但遭到忽视和报复。【原文：A former employee at Meta Platforms Inc.’s WhatsApp filed a federal lawsuit Monday alleging he repeatedly raised cybersecurity concerns about the messaging app with his superiors but was ignored and retaliated against.】

item.title: 鉴于 AT&T 和 SpaceX 的空中波段销售，FCC 终止对 EchoStar 的调查
item.description: 在 EchoStar 公司早些时候宣布将向 SpaceX 出售价值 170 亿美元的无线频谱后，联邦通信委员会周一解除了笼罩在该公司头上的监管阴云。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission lifted a regulatory cloud hanging over EchoStar Corp. on Monday after the company earlier announced it’s selling $17 billion worth of wireless spectrum to SpaceX.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将追随美国对美联储减息的乐观情绪：市场综述
item.description: 华尔街在美联储预期降息前的乐观情绪似乎将延续到亚洲交易中。【原文：Wall Street’s upbeat mood ahead of expected Federal Reserve rate cuts look set to carry into Asian trading.】

item.title: 特姆计划在美国积极卷土重来，降价 60
item.description: 在经历了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关税改革带来的数月动荡之后，电商平台特姆（Temu）正以大幅折扣重新进军美国市场，以期在与竞争对手申银万国集团有限公司（Shein Group Ltd.）的竞争中夺回一席之地。【原文：After months of turmoil from Donald Trump’s tariff changes, e-commerce platform Temu is charging back into the US market with deep discounts to regain ground against rival Shein Group Ltd.】

item.title: 取消美国气候科学的经济损失
item.description:
今日要闻：特朗普政府称，为了节省开支，它将削减气候科学工作的经费。但这可能会让美国付出数十年的代价。【原文：

Today on the Big Take: The Trump Administration says it’s cutting funding for climate science work to save money. But it could cost the US for decades.

】

item.title: 即使电信梦想破灭，厄根的财富仍飙升至 130 亿美元
item.description: 查理-厄根（Charlie Ergen）花费了十多年时间和数百亿美元，试图打造美国第四大电信运营商，如今他已将这一梦想付诸东流，并将把精力集中在为他的卫星电视和无线电话帝国制定一个更为温和的愿景上。【原文：After more than a decade and tens of billions of dollars spent trying to build a fourth major US telecom carrier, Charlie Ergen has put that dream to rest and will focus his energy on a more modest vision for his satellite-TV and wireless phone empire.】

item.title: 微软签署价值高达 194 亿美元的 Nebius 云计算协议
item.description: 微软公司达成了一项价值近 200 亿美元的多年期协议，将从 Nebius Group NV（从俄罗斯互联网巨头 Yandex 分拆出来的技术公司）获得人工智能云计算能力。【原文：Microsoft Corp. struck a multiyear deal worth nearly $20 billion to get AI cloud computing power from Nebius Group NV, the technology company spun out from Russian internet giant Yandex.】

item.title: Klarna 140 亿美元的估值吸引了金融科技讨价还价者
item.description: 在 Klarna Group Plc 周二晚些时候备受瞩目的定价首发之前，投资者正在抢购其股票。吸引投资者的部分原因是：这家 "现购现付 "贷款公司的隐含市场估值目前比竞争对手 Affirm Holdings Inc.【原文：Investors are snapping up orders for Klarna Group Plc shares ahead of its much-anticipated pricing debut late Tuesday. Part of the appeal: the buy-now-pay-later lender’s implied market valuation is currently about a 50% discount to rival Affirm Holdings Inc.】

item.title: Eurizon 的詹晓宁表示，中国人民币兑美元汇率可能跌至 6 低点
item.description: Eurizon SLJ Capital 首席执行官 Stephen Jen 表示，随着中国政府面临让人民币走强的压力，人民币兑美元有望大幅反弹。【原文：China’s yuan is poised for a huge rally against the dollar as Beijing comes under pressure to let its currency strengthen, according to Eurizon SLJ Capital chief executive Stephen Jen.】

item.title: 英国改革通过威胁取消项目破坏工党议程
item.description: 奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）只有四名议员，可能要等到 2029 年才有机会成为首相。但他的 "改革英国"（Reform UK）已经在试图引导投资者远离不符合其民粹主义议程的项目。【原文：Nigel Farage has only four members of Parliament and may have to wait until 2029 to have a shot at being prime minister. But his Reform UK is already trying to steer investors away from projects that don’t fit its populist agenda.】

item.title: 隐性通胀促使日本消费者使用价格跟踪网站
item.description: 在经历了三十年的物价下跌之后，日本消费者正面临着一种在世界其他地区被称为 "通货紧缩 "的新现象。为了应对这种情况，他们开始求助于一些草根网站，这些网站追踪洗衣粉和方便面等物品是如何变得越来越小、越来越贵的。【原文：After three decades of falling prices, Japanese consumers are facing a new phenomenon known in other parts of the world as shrinkflation. To cope, they’re turning to grassroots websites that track how items like laundry detergent and instant noodles are getting smaller and more expensive.】

item.title: 穆迪紧随惠誉，因墨西哥支持而上调墨西哥石油公司评级
item.description: 在墨西哥政府采取行动减轻钻井商的巨额债务负担并应对运营挑战后，穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）对墨西哥石油公司（Petroleos Mexicanos SA）的评级进行了双重升级。【原文：Moody’s Ratings gave Petroleos Mexicanos SA a double upgrade after the Mexican government moved to reduce the driller’s massive debt load and address operational challenges.】

item.title: 英特尔陈博士任命数据中心和个人电脑芯片组新领导人
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp.），这家一直在努力重振旗鼓的计算机芯片制造商，为其两个最大的产品部门任命了新的领导人，并表示之前负责这两个部门的资深高管米歇尔-约翰斯顿-霍尔索斯（Michelle Johnston Holthaus）将离开公司。【原文：Intel Corp., the computer-chip maker that has been struggling to revive its fortunes, appointed new leaders for its two biggest product groups and said Michelle Johnston Holthaus, a veteran executive previously in charge of the units, is leaving the company.】

item.title: 火鸡数量减少促使珀杜裁员 300 人
item.description: 消费者口味的改变和火鸡数量的减少促使普渡农场公司（Perdue Farms Inc.【原文：Shifting consumer tastes and a shrinking turkey flock are prompting Perdue Farms Inc. to lay off nearly 300 workers at a processing facility in Washington, Indiana — a move set for just a month before Americans sit down to Thanksgiving dinner.】

item.title: 戴尔首席财务官麦吉尔卸任，肯尼迪被任命为临时财务官
item.description: 戴尔科技公司表示，首席财务官伊冯娜-麦吉尔（Yvonne McGill）即将卸任，将由公司高级副总裁大卫-肯尼迪（David Kennedy）临时接替。【原文：Dell Technologies Inc. said Chief Financial Officer Yvonne McGill is stepping down and will be replaced on an interim basis by David Kennedy, a senior vice president with the firm.】

item.title: 非洲金融家为绿色倡议认捐 1000 亿美元
item.description: 非洲金融机构计划筹集 1,000 多亿美元，用于非洲大陆的绿色计划，以促进经济增长。【原文：African financial institutions plan to raise more than $100 billion for green initiatives across the continent to fuel economic growth.】

item.title: 美国农产品贸易逆差扩大，进口激增，创历史新高
item.description: 美国农产品贸易逆差在 7 月份进一步扩大，凸显了唐纳德-特朗普总统在誓言扭转这一趋势时所面临的挑战。【原文：The US agricultural trade deficit widened further in July, highlighting the challenge facing President Donald Trump as he vows to reverse the trend.】

item.title: 亚马逊收购拉美快递初创公司 Rappi 的股份
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）已入股哥伦比亚快递公司 Rappi Inc.【原文：Amazon.com Inc. has taken a stake in the Colombian delivery company Rappi Inc., a strategic partnership that pairs the e-commerce giant’s retail and technology infrastructure with one of Latin America’s best-known last-mile delivery outfits.】

item.title: 美国消费者信用卡借贷三个月来增幅最大
item.description: 在信用卡余额今年以来最强劲增长的带动下，7 月份美国消费者借贷增长幅度为三个月来最大。【原文：US consumer borrowing rose in July by most in three months, led by the strongest gain in credit-card balances this year.】
